register_subtitle: Complete the form below to create your account
your_data_is_safe: Your data is safe and won't be shared with third parties.
agree_terms: By continuing, you agree to the
name: Name
logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
onboarding_subtitle_1: RidersGuard helps you plan and monitor your touring safely.
onboarding_subtitle_2: Monitor your bike’s health before and after touring effortlessly.
onboarding_subtitle_3: All your bike data and service schedules are stored neatly in one app.
verify_email: To validate your account, enter the 6-digit code
reset_password_description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a password reset link.
about_app_description: RiderGuard is a safety and management app designed to help riders monitor, protect, and improve their delivery experience. From real-time tracking to emergency support, RiderGuard puts your safety first.
faq_1_answer: You can register, log in, and start ordering services directly from the RiderGuard app.
faq_2_answer: Yes, we use encryption and security systems to protect your data.
faq_3_question: How do I contact customer service?
faq_3_answer: You can contact us via the Help menu in the app.
privacy_body_1: We collect personal information such as your name, phone number, and location when using the RiderGuard app.
privacy_body_2: Your information is used to improve our services, provide better user experience, and ensure your safety.
privacy_body_3: We use encryption systems and access controls to protect your data from unauthorized parties.
email_notification_desc: Enable to receive updates via email.
enable_biometric_desc: Use fingerprint or face ID to login securely.
biometric_not_supported: Biometric authentication is not supported on this device.
